body: Hello Avicus! I was wondering if the players who use Optifine had any nice, and good looking texture packs they use whilst they use Optifine that make their gaming experience better. It would be awesome if you guys could give some suggestions, not only to me, but to other players aswell! Once again thank you! :D I personally use Faithful 32x32.
body_tagged: Hello Avicus! I was wondering if the players who use Optifine had any nice, and good looking texture packs they use whilst they use Optifine that make their gaming experience better. It would be awesome if you guys could give some suggestions, not only to me, but to other players aswell! Once again thank you! :D I personally use Faithful 32x32.
title: Texture Packs!

replies.body:
I personally don't like Faithful... To me it really ruins the "blocky feel" of Minecraft. So rather, I use Traditional Beauty...

You can find it here. 

http://www.minecrafttexturepacks.com/traditional-beauty/
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I wouldn't say Optifine make it all better eg. Custom texture packs may interfere with the mod, I use a 128x128 Faithfull PvP that I combined my self

replies.body: I know many texture packs, it all depends how good your computer is. I will share them if you tell me what your computer can handle.

replies.body: My computer is literally God. (If you believe in that sort of stuff!) But yea, i custom built it to my liking, post your texturepacks!
